trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Beach City
There were no other sightings in Beach City on or around August 1st 2013
Summary: Watching stars and observed 2 objects than they became one than 2
divs: Sighting DetailsOnce again I was watching the stars and seen blinking lights, I thaught it was 2 air craft at first, but thay seemed to get closer and than became one for about 3-4 sec. and split again. the one that split came back to the East and the other remained to the West. The East one remained seen for about another 7sec. and the West for about 7sec. after that. than they were gone. The West did not move or change direction. I did not know what I was watching but I had a uneasy feeling as they dicipered. It was a star light night No real cloud cover to speek of.
